mapper.insert: insert into pet(idx, pet, p_name, p_gender, p_weight, p_birth, p_neu) values (#{idx}, #{pet}, #{p_name}, #{p_gender}, #{p_weight}, #{p_birth}, #{p_neu})
mapper.select: select count(*) from pet where idx = #{idx} and p_name = #{p_name} and p_gender = #{p_gender} and p_birth = #{p_birth}
